section.name: About mmm-util-cli
section.p: This module provides excellent support to create a Command Line Interface (CLI).
section.subsection:
Here are some of the features provided by this module:
Annotation based configuration.
Build in support for parsing the arguments.
Build in support for help usage (-h or --help).
Build in support for version output (-v or --version).
All output with Native Language Support (NLS), automatic layout, hyphenation, etc.
Build in support for bean validation and error feedback.
For details and examples please read the javadoc.
